member.name: T:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64
member.summary: A class to encrypt or decrypt strings using using base-64 encoding for the encrypted data.

member.name: F:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.Alphabets
member.summary: The alphabets both upper and lower to generate characters to the pass-phrase end in case it is too short.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.EncryptFileBlocks(System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts the file blocks using and returns them as list of base-64 encoded strings.
member.param: Name of the file to split into encrypted base-64 encoded string blocks.
The password to use for the encryption.
Size of the block to use to split the file data.
member.returns: A List<System.String> containing the encrypted data.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.FillPassword(System.String)
member.summary: Fills the password to match the length required for 256 bit key size.
member.param: The password to fill with characters.
member.returns: The password matching the length required for 256 bit key size.
member.remarks: The data is not randomized encrypted.

member.name: P:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.BufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the buffer to be used with the encryption and decryption algorithms.
member.value: The size of the buffer to be used with the encryption and decryption algorithms.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.EncryptFileBlocks(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encrypts the file blocks using encryption with the specified file contents, password and block size (data blocks).
member.returns: List<System.String>. containing the file data divided into encrypted base-64 encoded string blocks.
member.exception: password - At least six digits is required for the password.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.AddBytes(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte}@,System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds specified amount of bytes to a specified byte list and additionally specified length.
member.param: The bytes to add more bytes into.
The length of how many bytes to add.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.InsertBytes(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Inserts the specified bytes into a specified byte array and additionally specified length.
member.param: The bytes to insert more bytes into.
The length of bytes to insert.
member.returns: System.Byte[] containing the combined byte array result.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.DecryptBase64Blocks(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Decrypts the specified encrypted base-64 environment variables into a byte array.
member.param: The password to use for the decryption.
A semicolon-delimited array of environment variables containing the data to decrypt.
member.returns: System.Byte[] containing the combined data of the from the specified environment variables.
member.exception: password - At least six digits is required for the password.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.EncryptDecryptTextAesBase64.DecryptBase64Block(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Decrypts a single base-64 encoded encrypted data.
member.param: The password to use for the decryption.
The base-64 value containing the data to decrypt.
member.exception: password - At least six digits is required for the password.

member.name: T:CryptEnvVar.Program
member.summary: A program to encrypt or decrypt data from small files.

member.name: T:CryptEnvVar.Program.Arguments
member.summary: The arguments passed to the program.

member.name: P:CryptEnvVar.Program.Arguments.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password to be used with the encryption/decryption.

member.name: P:CryptEnvVar.Program.Arguments.FileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the file for data input or output.

member.name: P:CryptEnvVar.Program.Arguments.BlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the block to be used with the encryption.

member.name: P:CryptEnvVar.Program.Arguments.EnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Gets or sets the environment variables as a semicolon (';') delimited list.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Defines the entry point of the application.
member.returns: A integer value describing the execution status of the program.

member.name: M:CryptEnvVar.Program.ShowHelp
member.summary: Displays the command line arguments for the software.
